page.title: 17CUSTOMS
page.content: {BRACO AND GREENLOANING GALA WEEK}runs from Wednesday to Sunday. On Wednesday they set up a{Car Tresure {Hunt}. It started at 7 pm from Braco Hall. You had to answer clues and collect plants, leaves and things. It finished at 9pm at the Hall. On Thursday in the {Braco Hotel}they held a dart and pool competition. If you won you won a shield which you can keep for ever (one for each of the winners). On Friday there was a { {Photographic display}in the Bowling Club. Anybody could enter with any photograph: the categories were still life, portrait and some others. The photographs were judges by a local naturalist called Keith Graham. On Saturday is the big {GALA DAY }which starts at 2pm with a fancy dress parade,led by pipers (from Alloa) to the Lodge Park. It was judged by Mr &
